content: good news crochet today is giving the pattern away free on their site also can be found in crochet today july/ august issue when signed in to knit and crochet now tv website 1 you can download this as a pdf 2 **registration and login required to see link to download ** 1 http //www knitandcrochetnow com/fly aspx layout=patternsindex&taxid=163 2 http //www knitandcrochetnow com/downloadfly aspx download=productimages/juliecuff pdf
